name: Kitten CATch
description:
Control your unruly kittens in Kitten CATch - A CUTE LITTLE GAME FOR KIDS AND CAT LOVERS.
They ride the Roomba, they scratch the furniture, they play with the iPad and they pretend to be pooping on the litterbox just to avoid being put to bed! AND they are constantly trying to escape through the garden gate. THEY ARE THE KITTENS IN Kitten CATch!

And your job is to control them. You're the mommy cat and you have to manage your unruly offspring! But thats not all; you also have to catch all the mice in the house and the big fat rat hiding in the garage. And just to make your job even more challenging, you must keep an eye out for the grumpy, old dog and the hard-hitting roomba. Yes, you definitely have your work cut out for you.

See how well YOU can manage the 3 rascal kittens!
